## Utils.getStampEffectiveBytes() function

Utility function that calculates the effective size of a postage batch based on its depth.

Below 22 depth the effective size is 0 Above 34 it's always &gt; 99%

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getStampEffectiveBytes(depth: number): number;
```

number

{<!-- -->number<!-- -->} The effective size of the postage batch in bytes.
